instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3332 fans spin fast for 2secs then go off and cycle
threads.message:
Previously worked on machine, notes from previous repair shop "battery not detected, replaced ISL and reflow SMC"
When it got here not even a green light, replaced SMC and ISL then G3H was measuring 1.3v with 8.9ohm to gnd short and GPU was getting hot.
Q8930, Q7550, Q7510 looked rusty so replaced and now get 12.53v on G3H and the fan near the GPU spins at full speed instantly for about 2seconds then goes off and will cycle after about 6secs. Cpu_vcore comes up to 1v for the 2secs that the fan spins

threads.title: 820-3332 fans spin fast for 2secs then go off and cycle
threads.message: GPU was probably fucked by shorted high side FET. Also should replace the buck controller for GPU Vcore if one of the FETs was shorted.
